title: Alliance Energy

r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $3.3M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with Alliance Energy. The average
  contract duration was 0.7 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $954.2K. The longest
  contract was 4.99 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $14.1M.
lookup_name: 'ALLIANCE ENERGY'
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '3.3M'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts: '17'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '3'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '18%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '14%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '5.67'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value: '2.8M'
s424_mean_duration: '0.7'
s421_mean_contract_value: '954.2K'
s425_max_duration: '4.99'
s422_max_contract_value: '14.1M'
---
